It would be hard to leave Atlantis.  Tucson had found many joys living upon=
 the island, most of them finding artifacts that he had collected and tried=
 hard to restore.  Yet they were only material objects, and if not for his =
enjoyment, for the enjoyment of others to look upon even after his wake.  
=

But he also knew that Lord Perseus was correct.  If they stayed any longer=
, it would harm the people.  He transforms out of his SUV mode and addresse=
s Lord Perseus formally, as taught by his Autobot bretheren.  Being blind, =
he pauses for a moment to hear if anyone was around him, to be sure that he=
 had not stepped on anyone when he transformed.  He then turns his head in =
Lord Perseus's direction.

" Yes your highness, as an Autobot, I promised n=
ot only to protect but to serve faithfully.  I will be joining you. "

He a=
lso realized that he had not formally introduced himself to his lord.  

" =
My name is Tucson, and as I explained earlier, I'm an Autobot, ready and wi=
lling to serve you faithfully."
